title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{63m^4}{\left(-7m^2\right)}-\frac{42m^3}{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$.
speech: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following:  fraction, 63 m to the fourth, over, parentheses, negative 7 m squared, ,  minus fraction, 42 m cubed, over, parentheses, negative 7 m squared, ,  .

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
